Wi-Fi geolocation tool can be used to locate user by using the global Wi-Fi databases (no GPS required).

Wi-Fi geolocation tool support the following methods of storing the API key:
  * launcher (API keys will be saved in auto-generated launcher) - default;
  * environment options (API keys will be saved in user's environment variables) - will require a system reboot;
  * manual mode - no API keys will be saved and must be forwarded manually using environment variables.

Personal API key can be obtained here:
  * https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/geolocation/intro;
  * https://ichnaea.readthedocs.io/en/latest/api/index.html;
  * https://yandex.ru/dev/locator/doc/dg/api/geolocation-api.html.
